itemDescription: Welsh politician and MP for Cardiff (1797-1853)

wikipedia_page.main: John Nicholl (21 August 1797 – 27 January 1853) was a Welsh Member of Parliament and was, for a very short time in 1835, a Lord Commissioner of the Treasury. His father was Sir John Nicholl, who like his son was a judge and politician.

response: ** John Iltyd Nicholl, Welsh Member of Parliament (d. 1853)
